It appears from what I'm seeing that the modem on that model is actually the same as mine.  "IBM Integrated 56k modem", MDC-2, in the CDC slot?
This is my lspci output: 0000:00:1e.3 Modem: Intel Corp. 82801FB/FBM/FR/FW/FRW (ICH6 Family) AC'97 Modem Controller (rev 03)

Either way, you might want to check out the trial versions of both the HSF (what I use) and HCF drivers from linuxant.com/drivers, see if they work, and if they do, go ahead and buy a license.  If not, keep exploering the other possibilities, but that's one option anyway.
